channel.title: CVE Feed for Ninja Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ninja Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51406|2024-08-02T22:32:09.192Z -- ninja%20team -- fastdup%20%E2%80%93%20fastest%20wordpress%20migration%20%26%20duplicator
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Ninja Team FastDup – Fastest WordPress Migration & Duplicator.This issue affects FastDup – Fastest WordPress Migration & Duplicator: from n/a through 2.1.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-37244|2024-07-22T20:27:35.083Z -- ninja%20team -- ninja%20beaver%20add-ons%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ninja Team Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ninja Beaver Add-ons for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 2.4.5.
